ingredients.ingredient: 1 (18.25 ounce) package moist yellow cake mix
1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, juice reserved
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice

cookingTips: Use mandarin orange juice (reserved) in cake batter for moisture
Cool cake completely before adding frosting
Fold whipped topping into pudding gently to maintain airiness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create a light, fruit-forward frosting and properly layer the cake for best flavor.
